privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.introduction: At Blinkeach, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use our website and services.

terms_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_conditions.introduction: Welcome to Blinkeach. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Blinkeach website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

return_refund.title: Return & Refund Policy
return_refund.introduction: At Blinkeach, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not entirely happy with your order, we're here to help. This Return & Refund Policy outlines our guidelines for returns, exchanges, and refunds.

shipping.title: Shipping Policy
shipping.introduction: This Shipping Policy outlines the terms and conditions for shipping products ordered through the Blinkeach platform. By placing an order with Blinkeach, you agree to the terms of this shipping policy.

footer.about_text: Blinkeach is your one-stop online shopping destination for a wide range of products at unbeatable prices. Our mission is to provide quality products and exceptional service to customers across India.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.meta_description: Get in touch with Blinkeach's customer support team. We're here to help you with any questions or concerns.
contact.thank_you_message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you shortly.
contact.get_in_touch_description: Have a question, comment, or suggestion? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.business_hours: Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
contact.address_line2: KB Lane, Near Yusuf Masjid, Ward No.13,
contact.form_description: Fill in the form below, and we'll respond within 24 hours.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.message_placeholder: Please provide details about your inquiry...
contact.form_footer: By submitting this form, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
contact.faq_business_hours_answer: Our customer service team is available Monday to Saturday, from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Our website is operational 24/7.
contact.faq_track_order_question: How can I track my order?
contact.faq_track_order_answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and navigating to the "My Orders" section. Alternatively, use the "Track Order" link in the footer.
contact.faq_return_policy_answer: We offer a 7-day return policy for most items. Please visit our Return & Refund Policy page for detailed information.

about.title: About Us
about.meta_description: Learn more about Blinkeach and our mission to provide the best shopping experience in India.
about.story_content: Founded in 2023, Blinkeach was born from a simple idea: to create an online shopping experience that truly understands and serves the diverse needs of Indian consumers. What began as a small venture has grown into one of India's most trusted e-commerce platforms, offering a wide range of products across multiple categories.
about.mission_content: At Blinkeach, our mission is to revolutionize the way India shops online by providing a seamless, secure, and personalized shopping experience that caters to the unique preferences and requirements of our customers.
about.value_customer_desc: Every decision we make is driven by what's best for our customers.
about.value_quality_desc: We rigorously verify all products to ensure they meet the highest standards.
about.value_innovation_desc: We constantly explore new technologies and approaches to enhance the shopping experience.
about.value_inclusivity_desc: We make our platform accessible to all Indians through multiple regional languages and interfaces.
about.value_responsibility_desc: We are committed to sustainable practices and supporting local communities.
about.team_content: Blinkeach is powered by a diverse team of passionate professionals who bring together their expertise in technology, retail, customer service, and logistics to create an exceptional shopping platform. Our team is united by a shared commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction.
about.achievements_content: Since our inception, we have served millions of customers across India, delivering countless products right to their doorsteps. We have been recognized for our excellence in customer service, our user-friendly platform, and our commitment to empowering sellers across the country.
about.join_us_content: We invite you to be a part of the Blinkeach family, whether as a customer, seller, or team member. Together, we can continue to transform the e-commerce landscape in India and beyond.
